siteMetadata.title: Irvin Ives Lau
siteMetadata.description: I'm Irvin, a frontend developer with first-class honors in Bachelor of Science in Computing specializing in web technologies and UX/UI design working full-time as a freelance software engineer that revolves around full-stack web development. This website consists of a showcase of my projects including some previous industry works as a developer and also other visual artworks that I have produced over the years of being a content creator/photographer/videographer.
siteMetadata.author: Irvin Ives Lau
